== Description ==
Extract a slice of an array, given a list of keys 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_array_slice_assoc( $array, $keys ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$array|array|The original array}}
{{Parameter|$keys|array|The list of keys}}

== Return Values ==
; (array) : The array slice
